ygData.subject: RE: GZ Answers
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t know if this works replying from digest mode but here goes. I think GZ and Rokenn missed a pretty major point on the lullaby test.  I think that all
ygData.messageBody:
Don't know if this works replying from digest mode but here goes.

I think GZ and Rokenn missed a pretty major point on the lullaby test. I
think that all lull/mez type spells don't work in PvP. Rokenn said that he
tested the song agains a level one human warrior. The only way that I know
how to do this is via PvP. To test the song with a real situation I would
go to a newbie area and test pixie strike against bats or something.

Geez almost worried about the Berserker Cresendo answer. I think that all
songs should have a bit more info after they are scribed. Know what skill
the song uses and wether the song is instrument only would be nice. And
remove the casting time info from bard songs. Three seconds is what they
have always been. Unless we get something that reduces bard casting time by
half I don't really see the need to remind us that a song takes 3 seconds to
cast. Whoops kinda ranted like someone from EQ was actually listening
there.

-Winu D'ryden, Bard 43.
